column1: * Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took depart the Shire and travel into the south.
* Faramir Took I succeeds his father Peregrin Took as Thain of the Shire.
* Death of Kings of Rohan Éomer.This takes place in year Fourth Age 64 by the reckoning of Gondor.

column3: becomes the nineteenth King of Rohan.

column1: * Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took then travel on to Gondor. Peregrin brings a copy of the Thains Book with him.
